trans-unit.source: A trigger action that begins a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> and distributes its animations to their targeted objects and properties.
trans-unit.target: Un'azione del trigger che inizia un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> e distribuisce le animazioni agli oggetti e proprietà di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to apply animations to their target properties and start them.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> azione con un <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> o <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> per applicare le animazioni alle proprietà di destinazione e avviarli.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> begins a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> on its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> reference when triggered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> inizia una <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> chiamando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> nel relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> fare riferimento quando attivato.

trans-unit.source: When you begin a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> on a property that is already being animated by another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> determines how the animation proceeds.
trans-unit.target: Quando si inizia un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> su una proprietà che è già animata da un altro <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> determina come procede l'animazione.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: Sospendere, riprendere, arrestare o controllare in modo interattivo uno Storyboard

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> that was declared in markup interactively, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.
trans-unit.target: Per essere in grado di sospendere, riprendere o controllare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> che è stato dichiarato nel markup in modo interattivo, è necessario impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> proprietà del relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.

trans-unit.source: You can then control the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile controllare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> oggetto (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) per controllarlo facendo riferimento al relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> non è specificato, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> non è possibile controllare in modo interattivo dopo l'inizio.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: In code, you may use the interactive methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class to control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that was applied using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.
trans-unit.target: Nel codice, è possibile utilizzare i metodi interattivi del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> classe per controllare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> applicato utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.

trans-unit.source: As is the case when using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objects, you must give the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> a name for its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to be interactively controllable.
trans-unit.target: Come accade quando si utilizza <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> oggetti, è necessario assegnare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> un nome per il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> essere controllabile interattivamente.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the proper hand-off behavior to start an animation clock in this storyboard
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il comportamento di distribuzione corretto per avviare un orologio dell'animazione in questo storyboard.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace" />.

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo di Compose HandoffBehavior

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose?displayProperty=nameWithType>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Quando si applica un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> a una proprietà tramite <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose?displayProperty=nameWithType>, qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> gli oggetti precedentemente associati a tale proprietà continueranno a utilizzare le risorse di sistema; il sistema di temporizzazione non rimuovere questi orologi in modo automatico.

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare problemi di prestazioni quando si applica un numero elevato di clock utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>, è necessario rimuovere clock di composizione dalla proprietà animata dopo il completamento.

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock:
trans-unit.target: Esistono diversi modi per rimuovere un orario in formato:

trans-unit.source: To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: Per rimuovere tutti gli orologi da una proprietà, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> metodo dell'oggetto animato.

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Specificare la proprietà viene aggiunta un'animazione come primo parametro, e `null` come il secondo.

trans-unit.source: This will remove all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo tutti gli orologi dell'animazione vengono rimossi dalla proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: Per rimuovere un oggetto specifico <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> da un elenco di orologi, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> per recuperare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, quindi chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Ciò avviene in genere il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> gestore eventi per un orologio.

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che solo i clock radice possono essere controllati da un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> restituisce proprietà di un orologio figlio `null`.

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Si noti inoltre che il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> evento non viene chiamato se la durata effettiva dell'orologio è infinita.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, l'utente deve determinare quando chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta principalmente di un problema relativo alle animazioni su oggetti di lunga durata.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Quando un oggetto viene sottoposto a garbage collection, anche i clock vengono disconnessi e raccolti nel Garbage Collector.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli oggetti clock, vedere [animazione e temporizzazione System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: By naming the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> object, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> can be controlled after it is started.
trans-unit.target: Denominando l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> può essere controllato dopo l’avvio.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Nome di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise interactively control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> to reference this name.
trans-unit.target: Per essere in grado di sospendere, riprendere o controllare in modo interattivo un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> proprietà del relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> e utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> oggetto come <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> per fare riferimento a questo nome.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively affected after it is begun; furthermore, when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> ends or enters its Fill period, the animation clocks are disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> non è specificato, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> non possono essere interessate in modo interattivo dopo l'inizio; inoltre, quando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> termina o immette il periodo di riempimento, il clock di animazione vengono eliminati.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> starts.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> che viene avviato da questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> starts.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> che viene avviato dal metodo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: nessuno

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard" />.
